name: FLOW Flexible Library for Optimised Wireframing
description:
V.2 update:

  • Use of variants and auto layout 3.0
  • Dark mode available for most components
  • Refreshed design


FLOW is a library which allows you to easily create detailed wireframes, without being too restrictive. You can use it as a starting point to keep everything efficient & consistent, but you'll still be encouraged to be creative and do some custom work.


------------------------------------------
